description:
Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen are in the throes of battle! Noboru and the others search for
an old card that Baku says Gao needs in his fight against Kyoya. Pushed to the brink, Gao casts Dragonic Force, a big gamble that could bring great harm to himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dohyaa! Chou Taiyou Ryuu vs Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu!!
Whoa! Super Sun Dragon Vs. Black Sky Sun Dragon!
ドヒャァー! 超太陽竜VS黒天太陽竜!!
